title: To Stachi - Wheat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Organic, Mediterranean, Take-out, Greek
description: Quaint side street with park and water view. Offers a variety of local traditional pies and pizzas, as well as 2-3 main courses plus coffee. Salads and side dishes are prepared on the spot. Fresh organic bread is baked every day. The Cretan owners cater to regular locals and tourists alike. Has Wi-Fi, small bookstore, natural products.
